proposal: #121 - POLKADOT HACKATHON EAST ASIA Edition - HackaDOT 2023
rationale: This referendum aims to provide funding for the upcoming hackhathon in South Korea.
details: The request amount was too high for such an event, that's why we voted NAY for referendum #121.

rationale: There is no proper description for this referendum, only a note from the author to reject it.
details: This referendum  was designed with errors, so the author marked it for rejection, that's why we voted NAY to cancel referendum #120.

rationale: This referendum aims to schedule the set of parachain auctions on Polkadot in 2023.
details: Approving this referendum will ensure proper scheduling of 18 Polkadot parachain auctions in 2023, allowing for new and renewed parachains, that's why we voted AYE for referendum #109.

proposal: #108 - Fix genesis registration for Manta Parachain
rationale: This referendum aims to fix the registration genesis.
details: Approving this referendum will help correct the incompatible parachain state & WASM files that were originally registered by Manta, that's why we voted AYE for referendum #108.
